ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Suckage
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, the GM was supposed to determine if this mob was supposed to aggro or not. If it was KOS to me then I accept it. But if not, I need to speak to the GM
ygData.messageBody:
Well, the GM was supposed to determine if this mob was supposed to aggro or
not. If it was KOS to me then I accept it. But if not, I need to speak to
the GM again.
luv,
-Su

> Its a lost cause.. You argoed a mob, there are a number of mobs in the
> seafarer's roost. Some of which are there only during certain game hours.
> Ya just have to be more careful about where you go. If you scroll back
I'm
> sure it told you by whom you were attacked. GM's will not reimburse you
for
> the problem which you described, to the least they are not allowed to.
> Sorry about that. =(
>
> DuHase 55 Outrider (retired guide)
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Su [mailto:suceress@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, May 22, 2001 1:35 AM
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Suckage
>
>
>
> I'll try asking at in-game chat what I should do and see what the ingame
GMs
> tell me.
> luv,
> -Su
>
> > I would repetition. After all the GM said they would get back with you
> but
> > they didn't. I'd petition and ask what she figured out. Sorry.
> >
> >
> > > I was in E Freeport with my dark elf. I really worked on my faction so
> that
> > > everyone conned at least dubious to me. I went into Seafarer's roost
and
> > > made sure to con everyone. Nobody was KOS. Most were apprehensive to
> > > indifferent. I went to buy from a merchant. As soon as I finished the
> > > transaction something started hitting me. I turned around and couldnt'
> see
> > > it anywhere. I ran from the building and soon I was dead. Even looking
> down
> > > at my corpse, whatever attacked me was not visible. I scrolled back up
> to
> > > see what I had done to piss it off. All the thing said before
attacking
> me
> > > was "How dare you!" It didn't say anything about me being a dark elf
or
> > > whatnot. I petitioned and the GM said that it probably attacked me
thru
> the
> > > wall and promised to get back to me later after she looked into it.
She
> > > never did. :-(
> > > The worst part was, I lost my level.. and I still haven't gotten back
> after
> > > a week. I lost 3 blue bubbles of xp. :-(
> > > What do you folks think? Should I repetion?
> > > luv,
> > > -Su
> >
> >
> >
> >
> >
>
